_comment: Example JSON output of an accessibility scan.  Represents scan results for a single URL.

issues.description: Text contrast is below the recommended level for WCAG AA.
issues.message: The contrast ratio between the text color '#A9A9A9' and background color '#FFFFFF' is only 2.2:1.  The minimum required ratio is 4.5:1.
issues.impact: Users with low vision may have difficulty reading this text.

issues.description: ARIA role requires children to contain particular roles.
issues.message: The element with role 'menubar' must have required children with role 'menuitem'.
issues.impact: Screen reader users may not be able to properly navigate the menu.

issues._comment: Example of a keyboard navigation issue.
issues.description: Ensure all page functionality is available using the keyboard.
issues.message: The 'Skip to Content' link is not visible when it receives focus.
issues.impact: Users who rely on keyboard navigation may not be able to easily bypass repetitive content.

issues._comment: Example of an image alt text issue.
issues.impact: Screen reader users will not understand the purpose of the image.
